mil6.1.2:1.1_1: bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā mātucchāya mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā vassikasāṭikāya dīyamānāya ‘saṅghe, gotami, dehi,
mil6.1.2:1.1_2: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:1.2_1: tathāgato saṅgharatanato na bhāriko na garuko na dakkhiṇeyyo,
mil6.1.2:1.2_2: yaṁ tathāgato sakāya mātucchāya sayaṁ piñjitaṁ sayaṁ luñcitaṁ sayaṁ pothitaṁ sayaṁ kantitaṁ sayaṁ vāyitaṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ attano dīyamānaṁ saṅghassa dāpesi.
mil6.1.2:1.3_1: tathāgato saṅgharatanato uttaro bhaveyya adhiko vā visiṭṭho vā,
mil6.1.2:1.3_2: ‘mayi dinne mahapphalaṁ bhavissatī’ti na tathāgato mātucchāya sayaṁ piñjitaṁ sayaṁ luñcitaṁ sayaṁ pothitaṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ saṅghe dāpeyya, yasmā ca kho,
mil6.1.2:1.3_3: bhante nāgasena tathāgato attānaṁ na patthayati na upanissayati,
mil6.1.2:1.3_4: tasmā tathāgato mātucchāya taṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ saṅghassa dāpesī”ti.
mil6.1.2:2.1_1: bhagavatā mātucchāya mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā vassikasāṭikāya dīyamānāya ‘saṅghe, gotami, dehi,
mil6.1.2:2.1_2: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:2.2_0: Taṁ pana na attano patimānanassa avipākatāya na adakkhiṇeyyatāya, api ca kho, mahārāja,
mil6.1.2:2.2_1: hitatthāya anukampāya anāgatamaddhānaṁ saṅgho mamaccayena cittīkato bhavissatīti vijjamāneyeva guṇe parikittayanto evamāha—
mil6.1.2:2.3_1: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:3.1_1: pitā dharamānoyeva amaccabhaṭabaladovārikaanīkaṭṭhapārisajjajanamajjhe rañño santike puttassa vijjamānaṁyeva guṇaṁ pakitteti ‘idha ṭhapito anāgatamaddhānaṁ janamajjhe pūjito bhavissatī’ti.
mil6.1.2:3.2_1: tathāgato hitatthāya anukampāya anāgatamaddhānaṁ saṅgho mamaccayena cittīkato bhavissatīti vijjamāneyeva guṇe pakittayanto evamāha—
mil6.1.2:3.3_1: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:4.1_1: tāvatakena vassikasāṭikānuppadānamattakena saṅgho tathāgatato adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā.
mil6.1.2:4.2_1: mātāpitaro puttānaṁ ucchādenti parimaddanti nahāpenti sambāhenti, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil6.1.2:4.2_2: tāvatakena ucchādanaparimaddananahāpanasambāhanamattakena ‘putto mātāpitūhi adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā’”ti?
mil6.1.2:4.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, akāmakaraṇīyā, bhante, puttā mātāpitūnaṁ,
mil6.1.2:4.4_1: na tāvatakena vassikasāṭikānuppadānamattakena saṅgho tathāgatato adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vāti.
mil6.1.2:4.5_0: Api ca tathāgato akāmakaraṇīyaṁ karonto mātucchāya taṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ saṅghassa dāpesi.
mil6.1.2:5.1_2: taṁ rājā upāyanaṁ aññatarassa bhaṭassa vā balassa vā senāpatissa vā purohitassa vā dadeyya.
mil6.1.2:5.2_1: puriso tāvatakena upāyanapaṭilābhamattakena raññā adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā”ti?
mil6.1.2:5.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, rājabhattiko, bhante, so puriso rājūpajīvī,
mil6.1.2:5.4_1: na tāvatakena vassikasāṭikānuppadānamattakena saṅgho tathāgatato adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā,
mil6.1.2:5.5_0: Taṭṭhāne ṭhapento tathāgato saṅghassa vassikasāṭikaṁ dāpesi.
mil6.1.2:6.1_2: mama santakena saṅghaṁ paṭipūjessāmī’ti saṅghassa vassikasāṭikaṁ dāpesi, na, mahārāja,
mil6.1.2:7.1_1: bhagavatā devātidevena majjhimanikāyavaralañchake dhammadāyādadhammapariyāye appicchappaṭipattiṁ pakittayamānena ‘asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca pāsaṁsataro cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:7.2_1: bhavesu koci satto tathāgatato dakkhiṇeyyo vā uttaro vā adhiko vā visiṭṭho vā,
mil6.1.2:8.1_1: saṁyuttanikāyavare māṇavagāmikena devaputtena bhagavato purato ṭhatvā devamanussamajjhe—
mil6.1.2:11.1_1: māṇavagāmikena devaputtena gāthā sugītā na duggītā, subhāsitā na dubbhāsitā, anumatā ca bhagavatā, nanu, mahārāja,
mil6.1.2:13.1_1: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
